The app allows the user to import one or multiple exported {{< fa brands whatsapp >}} chats for analysis and is written using the {golem} framework for production-grade and robust shiny apps.

Main {{< fa brands r-project >}} packages used: {golem}, {shiny}, {shinymodules}, {ggplot2}, {rwhatsapp}, {plotly} and packages of the {tidyverse}
